entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Victoria Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
